gale:repo.gale:text: things you would find in a paper version of this thesis

Though the actual body of this thesis is only available through the adaptive hypermedia system GALE, it does exist in some physical form. The thesis was published in a DVD case containing a small booklet with an executive summary and some required sections that can usually be found in any thesis. These sections are: * Official [[appendix/title|title page]] * [[appendix/summary|Summary]] * [[appendix/samenvatting|Samenvatting]] (dutch) * [[appendix/acknowledgements|Acknowledgements]] * [[appendix/cv|Curriculum Vitae]] * [[appendix/siks|SIKS dissertation series]]
